channel.title: CVE Feed for Panasonic -- Sanyo CCTV Network Camera
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Panasonic -- Sanyo CCTV Network Camera

item.title: CVE-2022-4621|2024-08-03T01:48:39.080Z -- panasonic -- sanyo%20cctv%20network%20camera
item.description: Panasonic Sanyo CCTV Network Cameras versions 1.02-05 and 2.03-0x are vulnerable to CSRFs that can be exploited to allow an attacker to perform changes with administrator level privileges.
